text: The 1891 New York Giants season was the franchise's 9th season. The team finished in third place in the National League with a 71-61 record, 13 games behind the Boston Beaneaters. == Regular season == === Season standings === === Record vs. opponents === === Roster === {| class="toccolours" style="font- size: 95%;" |- !
